And one of the things we always focus the vast majority of our time on I Would say every time we get on the air and every time we can get you know in front of a group of people is really talking about income and talking about how to
How to generate more income inside of the financial markets and one of the things we always stress and I I Know we'll spend a lot of time on a tear today is how to really get that consistent growth that consistent income in the markets
Whether the markets are going up and whether the market's going down whether the market's going sideways and and that's really the the key is because there's three directions and and as individuals were very comfortable with the buying hold

Is really the consistency side of things because really if we're going to have consistent growth in the market we can't be directional Lee dependent than what I mean by that is we can't
Only profit if the market goes in one direction I don't I don't know about you but one of my favorite things
When I teach at half day classier it on a train economy one of my favorite things it's really work with the class and get them to viewed down markets as opportunities not just bad things you know so many times the down markets are viewed as oh that's so bad 'cause people are losing money and all that is true if we're just in that bullish biased as markets are going down
With the right knowledge and what the right skills those can be viewed as as great opportunities to make money I mean if you go back through some of the major crashes that we've experienced and you can you can find the source of the world the pulses of the world and you can find the the word billionaire next to their name
At the end of a lot of these crashes and so it's always interesting how how how maybe millions are made on the way up the billions are made on the way down
And it really just boils back to consistency we want to make money we want to make money on the way up and we want to make money on the way down but what are some of the things you guys are working on with the students right now or some of the some of the new tools you and your instructor team are are laying out there right now to help people become more consistent and less directional independent inside of the markets
Will this last week has been beautiful I mean everything we've been talking about on the show together I'm Talking about this for weeks now waiting for the opportunity to see the markets correct and come back down and as a result what happens starting off at the end of last week into this week as we got everybody's wish that
The market started coming down it comes down three times faster than it goes up and a lot of our students were taught that once that market goes down you could actually make money shorting the market it's called shorting where you're actually selling in the market
As opposed to most people who buy the markets so a lot of our students shift from that fear of oh my God the market's going down I don't know what to do more to lose money to well I can actually learn how to make money if the markets go down it's simply doing what the banks do
Big banks are always out there to make money whether the markets go up down sideways and what a lot of our students seeing we tell them is do you see how this would benefit you by learning how to trade in more than just one direction
And when you look at even the difference between let's even just say a mutual fund versus a hedge fund and the mutual fund is generally just investing into a long position and they called a mutual funds because it's this joint effort between us and the financial institution but it only makes money as the markets are going up but it doesn't mean that strategy is never useful now that product is never useful that's not what I'm trying to get out here
But as it's going down those phones are generally losing money and we're paying fees to be involved or to be invested into that fund you look at the a hedge fund type strategy and and that word Hedges pretty critical because hedge
Is meaning that there is a position that prompts on the way up and there's also protection or even a position that could profit on the way down and so when you start looking at things as far as the market's going there's multiple directions in the market the up down into sideways
It's critical to make sure that we have strategies kind of like that hedged mentality that can make money if the markets are going up down her sideways and you're one of the things I talked about it
